trans-unit.source: Provides a set of methods for identifying inherited components.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um conjunto de métodos para identificar o componentes herdados.

trans-unit.source: The InheritanceService can be used to find inherited components, select which ones to ignore, and retrieve the inheritance attribute of each inherited class that is tracked by the service.
trans-unit.target: O InheritanceService pode ser utilizado para localizar os componentes herdados, selecione aqueles para ignorar e obter o atributo de herança de cada classe herdada que é controlada pelo serviço.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.InheritanceService"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.InheritanceService"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Adds the components inherited by the specified component to the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.InheritanceService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona os componentes herdados pelo componente especificado para o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.InheritanceService"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method searches all the fields of all base classes of the specified component.
trans-unit.target: Este método procura todos os campos de todas as classes de base do componente especificado.

trans-unit.source: Each field that implements <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent> is added to the specified container.
trans-unit.target: Cada campo que implementa <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent>é adicionado ao contentor especificado.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent>

trans-unit.source: The component to search for inherited components to add to the specified container.
trans-unit.target: Pesquise o componente herdado componentes para adicionar o contentor especificado.

trans-unit.source: The container to add the inherited components to.
trans-unit.target: O contentor para adicionar os componentes a herdado.

trans-unit.source: Adds the components of the specified type that are inherited by the specified component to the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.InheritanceService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona os componentes do tipo especificado que são herdados pelo componente especificado para o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.InheritanceService"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method searches all the fields of all base classes of component.
trans-unit.target: Este método procura todos os campos de todas as classes de base do componente.

trans-unit.source: Each field that implements <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent> is added to an internal list that stores an <xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute> that identifies the inheritance level of the component.
trans-unit.target: Cada campo que implementa <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent>é adicionado a uma lista interna que armazena uma <xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute>que identifica o nível de herança do componente.</xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent>

trans-unit.source: The component is then added to the specified container.
trans-unit.target: O componente é então adicionado ao contentor especificado.

trans-unit.source: The base type to search for.
trans-unit.target: O tipo base para procurar.

trans-unit.source: The component to search for inherited components to add to the specified container.
trans-unit.target: Pesquise o componente herdado componentes para adicionar o contentor especificado.

trans-unit.source: The container to add the inherited components to.
trans-unit.target: O contentor para adicionar os componentes a herdado.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.InheritanceService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Versões de todos os recursos utilizados pelo <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.InheritanceService"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Calling Dispose allows the resources used by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.InheritanceService> to be reallocated for other purposes.
trans-unit.target: Chamar Dispose permite que os recursos utilizados pelo <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.InheritanceService>para possível reatribuir porque para outros fins.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.InheritanceService>

trans-unit.source: For more information about Dispose, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre Dispose, consulte [recursos não geridos limpeza](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.InheritanceService"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Liberta os recursos não geridos utilizados pelo <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.InheritanceService"> </xref> e opcionalmente liberta os recursos geridos.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()`method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método é denominado pelo público `Dispose()`método e o <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>método.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()`invoca protegida `Dispose(Boolean)` método com o `disposing` parâmetro definido como `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>invoca `Dispose` com `disposing` definido como `false`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.InheritanceService> references.
trans-unit.target: Quando o `disposing` parâmetro for true, este método versões retidos por quaisquer objetos geridos de todos os recursos que este <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.InheritanceService>referências.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.InheritanceService>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Este método invoca o `Dispose()` método de cada objeto referenciado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para libertar recursos geridos e; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para libertar recursos apenas não geridos.

trans-unit.source: Gets the inheritance attribute of the specified component.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o atributo de herança do componente especificado.

trans-unit.source: If the component is not inherited, this method returns the value <xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: Se o componente não é herdado, este método devolve o valor <xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it returns the inheritance attribute for this component.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, devolve o atributo de herança para este componente.

trans-unit.source: The component to retrieve the inheritance attribute for.
trans-unit.target: O componente para obter o atributo de herança para.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute"></xref> that describes the level of inheritance that this component comes from.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute"> </xref> que descreve o nível de herança que vêm este componente.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether to ignore the specified member.
trans-unit.target: Indica se pretende ignorar o membro especificado.

trans-unit.source: The member to check.
trans-unit.target: O membro para verificar.

trans-unit.source: This member is either a <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo> or a <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>.
trans-unit.target: Este membro é um um <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo>ou um <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>.</xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> </xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo>

trans-unit.source: The component instance this member is bound to.
trans-unit.target: A este membro está vinculado a instância do componente.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified member should be included in the set of inherited components; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o membro especificado deve ser incluído no conjunto de componentes herdados; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
